channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unilever hit ‘new levels of oppressiveness,’ Ben & Jerry’s claims as its CEO was sacked over his refusal to ‘silence the social mission’
item.description: David Stever had been with Ben & Jerry’s for 34 years in total. Ben & Jerry's claims Unilever didn't oust him for performance reasons.

item.title: Successful women leaders have P&L experience—but many are getting it too late to shape their career trajectories
item.description: P&L roles are critical for making it to the C-suite.

item.title: General Mills cuts outlook after reporting slow snack sales

Exclusive: Crypto wallet infrastructure company Privy raises $15 million in round led by Ribbit Capital
item.description: The company will use the money to double the size of its team in the next 18 months.

item.title: Scared Tesla owners are petitioning Elon Musk to add a feature that would warn off vandals as more cars are set on fire
item.description: Owners worry they are being targeted due to anger over CEO Elon Musk involvement in the Trump administration: "There definitely is fear right now."

item.title: Nvidia CEO’s remark solidifies mining company Freeport-McMoRan as an AI play
